articles.description: Wisk was launched by Google co-founder Larry Page and is one of dozens of businesses electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft but differs in making them autonomous from the outset

Boeing Co is investing a further $450 million in Wisk to support development of future pilotless flying taxis, the US aerospace giant said on Monday.
